extracted_playbook.condition: Is upgrading to firmware version 8.8.3 possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Firmware Version 8.8.3
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade all affected mGuard devices to firmware version 8.8.3 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Detach Network Cables from Affected Switch Ports
extracted_playbook.description: As a mitigation measure, detach network cables from affected switch ports instead of deactivating by configuration.
